```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```


```{r}
riskData <- read_rds("riskData.rds")
riskData <- riskData %>% 
  select(-SDvolume)
na.exclude(riskData)
```

```{r}
preProcess <- c("center","scale")

i <- createDataPartition(y = riskData$riskClass, times = 1, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)

training_set <- riskData[i,]
test_set <- riskData[-i,]
```

```{r}
trControl <- trainControl(method = "repeatedcv",number = 10,repeats = 10)

model <- train(riskClass ~ ., method='knn', data = training_set, metric='Accuracy',preProcess = preProcess, trControl=trControl)
```
